title: Radical 32
text:
Radical 32 or radical earth () meaning "<a href="Soil">earth</a>" is one of the 31 <a href="Kangxi%20radical">Kangxi radical</a>s (214 radicals total) composed of three <a href="Stroke%20%28CJK%20character%29">strokes</a>.
In the "<a href="Kangxi%20Dictionary">Kangxi Dictionary</a>", there are 580 characters (out of 49,030) to be found under this <a href="Radical%20%28Chinese%20characters%29">radical</a>.
 is also the 29th indexing component in the "<a href="Table%20of%20Indexing%20Chinese%20Character%20Components">Table of Indexing Chinese Character Components</a>" predominantly adopted by <a href="Simplified%20Chinese%20characters">Simplified Chinese</a> dictionaries published in <a href="mainland%20China">mainland China</a>. Kangxi <a href="radical%2033">radical 33</a> ( "scholar") is merged to this radical as an associated indexing component of the principal indexing component in mainland China.
In the <a href="China">Chinese</a> <a href="Wuxing%20%28Chinese%20philosophy%29">wuxing</a> ("Five Phases"), 土 represents the element <a href="Earth%20%28wuxing%29">earth</a>.
